title.rendered: Join us for Kid’s Corner Tomorrow!

content.rendered: We have had a blast at Kid’s Corner the past few weeks! Joining us tomorrow as our guest reader is Mrs. Sprague, a kindergarten teacher at Central Fellowship Christian Academy.The theme this week is Disney Heroes. Come ready to learn what it means to be a hero! Kids are invited to dress up as their favorite Disney character. Kid’s Corner will be held at our Warner Robins location on Russell Parkway tomorrow, July 24th at 10:00 a.m. Every child who attends will receive a FREE Disney story book!
